summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of redesigned Fichas and Tizados popups in BasesPage. All features working correctly as per the reference design.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - minor accessibility issue

passed_tests: Popup de Fichas: Title 'Fichas de Base #ID' displays correctly
Popup de Fichas: 'Crear Nueva Ficha' button expands the form
Popup de Fichas: Form has 'Nombre de Ficha' and 'Archivo' fields
Popup de Fichas: Can upload a file with custom name
Popup de Fichas: Table shows created fichas with numbering (#), name, file badge (PDF), and actions
Popup de Fichas: Can delete a ficha from the list
Popup de Fichas: Search field filters fichas by name
Popup de Fichas: 'Cerrar' button closes the dialog
Popup de Fichas: 'Guardar Ficha' button disabled when form is incomplete
Popup de Fichas: Success toast 'Ficha creada correctamente' shown after save
Popup de Fichas: Delete toast 'Archivo eliminado' shown after delete
Popup de Tizados: Same design as Fichas popup
Popup de Tizados: Title 'Tizados de Base #ID' displays correctly
Popup de Tizados: 'Crear Nuevo Tizado' button expands the form
Popup de Tizados: Form has 'Nombre de Tizado' and 'Archivo' fields
Popup de Tizados: Can create and delete tizados
Popup de Tizados: Table shows created tizados with numbering, name, file badge, and actions
Popup de Tizados: Success toast 'Tizado creado correctamente' shown after save
Popup de Tizados: Delete toast 'Archivo eliminado' shown after delete
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: DialogContent missing aria-describedby attribute for accessibility - consider adding DialogDescription component from shadcn/ui
seed_data_creation: Created test PDF file at /tmp/test_ficha.pdf for file upload testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Fichas and Tizados popups in BasesPage have been fully tested. Both popups follow the same design pattern with: title showing Base ID, 'Crear Nueva' button that expands a form, search field, table with columns (#, Nombre, Archivo, Acciones), and Cerrar button. File upload requires both name and file to be provided before the save button is enabled.
